At TPTP4_4 i2 testing
1. profile an application and collect memory, execution and method statistics.
2. switch to Log Navigator, import logs.
3  switch to Profile Monitor view, open execution statistics view.
4. switch to Log Navigator,An error message dialog pop up"An error has occured, see error log for details".
5. If I want to close the execution statistics view in the Log Navigator, An error message dialog pop up" An error has occured while activating this view"
This only happend for execution statistics view. No error messages for memory and method statistics views.
